doc:
Roberto Cairo https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roberto_Cairo 0 Roberto Andrés Cairo Pablo (3 May 1963 – 28 August 2014) was a Spanish film and television actor. He appeared in various television series and films mostly as supporting actor, most notably as Desi in the TV series Cuéntame cómo pasó. He died on 28 August 2014 due to lung cancer. Roberto_Andrés_Cairo_Pablo ( 3_May_1963 – 28_August_2014 ) was a_Spanish_film_and_television_actor . He appeared in various_television_series_and_films mostly as supporting actor , most_notably as Desi in the_TV_series_Cuéntame_cómo_pasó . He died on 28_August_2014 due to lung_cancer .
